message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair deal.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market price. I'm willing to negotiate further to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your perspective on the value, I'm confident that this product offers significant benefits that justify a higher price point. I'm willing to come down slightly to $17,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the true value of the product.

Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer and coming down to $17,000. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $14,000. I think this is a fair compromise that reflects the product's value while also being mindful of my budget.
